info.name: Soft dark Google
info.description: A dark  and relaxing Google theme.
info.additionalInfo:
This project starts as a fork from the Abyss for Google theme by Badiz at: https://userstyles.org/styles/132301/abyss-for-google
Improvements from the original Abyss project are:
* Link hover color changed from red to white
* Dark theme in all the search views like Images, Videos, etc
* Other small bug fixes and color changed
